NetSquid package
================

The NetSquid package consists of several subpackages that stack as:

.. image:: _static/netsquidstack.png
    :align: center
    :width: 200px

The subpackages are documented in the next sections, including example snippets.
This documentation is automatically generated using Python docstrings
(using the `autodoc extension <http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/ext/autodoc.html>`_).

.. toctree::
    :caption: Subpackages

    netsquid.qubits
    netsquid.components
    netsquid.components.models
    netsquid.nodes
    netsquid.protocols
    netsquid.util
    netsquid.examples
